thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TransferWise | transferwise.com | 16 of 1794
thread.title: Katerina

author: Katerina
title: Katerina
text: I've made several transfers through TransferWise. I'm very impressed: they are 100% transparent about their pricing, and all the transfers have been at least as quick as they've estimated, and sometimes much quicker. A credit card to bank transaction I made yesterday was estimated to take 3 days - and it took only a couple of hours! Their user interface is great - much better than my bank's. I unreservedly recommend them!
